H0.text: Who stars in the 2008 movie Seven Pounds. Denzel Washington

H1.text: Who stars in the 2008 movie Seven Pounds. Matt Damon

H2.text: Who stars in the 2008 movie Seven Pounds. Leonardo DiCaprio

H3.text: Who stars in the 2008 movie Seven Pounds. Will S.

A5.text: Seven Pounds is a 2008 American drama film directed by Gabriele Muccino, written by Grant Nieporte, and starring Will Smith as a man who sets out to change the lives of seven people; Rosario Dawson, Woody Harrelson, and Barry Pepper also star.
